name: East Coast-Inspired Lobster Roll
author: AshleyJohnson
summary: Summertime calls for more backyard barbecues, tailgates, and family get-togethers. This decadent lobster roll recipe is perfect for entertaining on any warm afternoon or evening.
ingredients: 4  cooked lobster tails, chopped into bite-sized pieces
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup butter, or to taste
4  white hot dog buns (such as Wonder®)
¼ cup thinly sliced chives, or as needed
directions: Combine lobster meat, mayonnaise, celery, lemon juice, mustard, salt, and black pepper in a bowl
Preheat the oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Butter hot dog buns evenly and toast in the preheated oven until lightly golden, 3 to 5 minutes
Fill toasted buns evenly with lobster mixture
Garnish with potato chips, pickles, chives, and parsley
